document_data.mainbody: '''''The Familiar'' #1''' was published by video game developer [[Beamdog]] on March 12, 2016. The digital magazine contains several articles intended to promote Beamdog's [[Dungeons & Dragons]] products, as well as a licensed short story tying in with ''[[Baldur's Gate: Siege of Dragonspear]]''.
document_data.Dangerous World:
{{Main|The Familiar 2/Dangerous World}}
: ''By [[Andrew Foley]].''
A short story about [[M'Khiin Grubdoubler]], a companion character in ''Siege of Dragonspear''.
